body.p: A USB port on the front of the touchscreen display compartment lets you download the log file to a PC. When a PC is connected to this port with a USB cable, a shortcut is created on the PCâ€™s desktop. Clicking this shortcut will automatically download the Event Log as a CSV file to the PC. For security reasons, no other action is taken. The PC cannot send input to the STS and cannot request any other information.
